definition: A stable identifier for the person record in our system.
The person’s current employer or organization.
The person’s current job title at their organization.
A capability or area of expertise the person possesses.
An educational institution attended by the person.
An academic degree held by the person.
The field of study associated with an education.
An email address used to contact the person.
A telephone number used to contact the person.
A URL that points to the person’s public profile page.
The country where the person is primarily located for work.
The city or region associated with a particular position or role.
